attributes.action: give the people of this land a referendum on whether or not we should employ the Yemeni penalty for crimes of paedophilic rape followed by murder of the victim, public execution by a bullet through the back of the head.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Yemen does not, like this country, allow its paedophile murderers back onto the streets to kill again; and again; and again.  The people of this country should be allowed to give an opinion as to the punishment which should be meted out to rapists and murderers because politicians and our present judiciary go to extremes to nurture these criminals while ignoring the threat they pose to the innocents of this land, innocents have to make do with the local PC bobbies and do not have access (despite that they fund it) to the same specialist protection groups which surround our politicians and members of the judiciary.
